author: GameSpot
description:
Can the games industry every return to a time when the big corporations return to putting out multiple smaller games? Lucy and Kurt don't think so.

Watch the full Kurt & Lucy Gotcha Covered Episode: https://youtu.be/kIq5KsBma3Q

Credits: Lucy James, Kurt Indovina, Jean-Luc Seipke

#gotchacovered #gaming #gamespot
title: The Gaming Industry Will Never Be What It Once Was
